segments.description: A close-up shot of a young adult's face with determination, set against the backdrop of a breathtaking mountain range. The camera quickly zooms out to reveal the individual gearing up with extreme sports equipment, showcasing excitement and readiness for adventure.
segments.visualPrompt: Close-up of a young adult's face filled with determination, natural light highlighting their features. As the camera zooms out, reveal a stunning mountain range in the background. The individual is adjusting their helmet and strapping on gear, embodying excitement and readiness for extreme sports. Framing should be centered, capturing the energy of the moment.
visualPromptAlternatives: Wide shot of a group of young adults preparing for a mountain biking adventure, with bright sunlight illuminating the scene. The camera pans across their faces, showcasing excitement and camaraderie.
Dynamic handheld camera movement following a young adult as they sprint towards the mountain, capturing their adrenaline and the breathtaking landscape around them.
A drone shot capturing a group of young adults at the top of a mountain, with one individual standing at the edge, arms raised in triumph, embodying excitement and adventure.
Close-up of a skateboarder tying their shoelaces, the camera then tilting up to focus on their confident expression as they prepare for a thrilling ride.

segments.description: The scene transitions to the individual rapidly descending a rocky mountain trail on a mountain bike, showcasing intense speed and agility. The camera captures their focused expression and the thrill of the ride, with quick cuts to breathtaking views of the landscape.
segments.visualPrompt: Action-packed shots of a young adult speeding down a rocky mountain trail on a mountain bike, the camera alternating between close-ups of their intense facial expressions and wide shots capturing the stunning landscape. Soft natural light reflects off the rocks, enhancing the thrill of the ride. The composition emphasizes speed and excitement, with the bike prominently in frame.
visualPromptAlternatives: A side angle shot of a skateboarder performing tricks at a skate park, with a dynamic tilt to emphasize the height of their jumps.
Close-up shots of a rock climber's hands gripping the rocks, interspersed with wide shots of their ascent against a dramatic backdrop.
A GoPro-style perspective from the front of a mountain biker racing downhill, giving a sense of speed and adrenaline while showcasing the rugged terrain.
Wide shot of surfers catching waves, with the camera sweeping along the shoreline to highlight the action and thrill of the sport.
segments.audioNotes: Music: Fast-paced electronic music intensifying the adrenaline rush. Voiceover: 'Feel the thrill as you push your limits and chase your adventure.'

segments.description: The video culminates with the individual reaching the bottom of the trail, grinning with exhilaration. They take a moment to catch their breath and reach into their backpack to grab the featured energy drink, holding it up to the camera with a big smile.
segments.visualPrompt: The camera captures the young adult at the bottom of the trail, panting with exhilaration, framed against the stunning landscape. As they pull out the energy drink from their backpack, the camera zooms in on the product, showcasing its vibrant packaging and branding. The lighting is bright, emphasizing the freshness of the drink. The individual takes a sip, clearly enjoying the boost it provides.
visualPromptAlternatives: Close-up of the energy drink can being opened with a satisfying pop, the camera focusing tightly on the condensation and vibrant colors of the packaging.
Wide shot of the individual celebrating their ride with friends, all holding the energy drink, with laughter and energy in the air.
A slow-motion shot of the energy drink being poured into a glass, highlighting the fizz and freshness, followed by the individual taking a refreshing sip.
Dynamic shot of the individual tossing the energy drink can to the camera, catching it perfectly, followed by them holding it up with a big smile.
segments.audioNotes: Music: Fades into an uplifting, energetic tune. Voiceover: 'Try it now and feel the rush. Unleash your potential with every sip!'
